meanings.definition: Not able to be recognized or identified.
meanings.sent1: The old photo was so blurry that the faces were unrecognizable.
meanings.sent2: After the accident, his car was so damaged that it became unrecognizable.
meanings.sent3: The messy room was so unrecognizable that even the cat couldn't find its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The once beautiful painting was now covered in graffiti, making it completely unrecognizable.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious figure wore a mask that made their face unrecognizable to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The foreign language on the sign was unrecognizable to the tourists.
meanings.sent2: The new student's name was unrecognizable to the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The strange plant in the garden was unrecognizable to the botanist.
meanings.sent4: The distant town was so small and unrecognizable from afar.
meanings.sent5: The voice on the phone was distorted and unrecognizable, making it hard to understand.
